ygData.subject: Re: Armor for middling levels?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hail again fellow Monks...      *Warning- Possible spoiler* When I hit level 20 i got a couple friends together and headed to Guk. After we arrived we
ygData.messageBody:
>

Hail again fellow Monks... *Warning- Possible spoiler*
When I hit level 20 i got a couple friends together and headed to
Guk. After we arrived we decided to send a few tells, to see if we could get
some imput into what we wanted to look for. For fellow monks not familiar with
what type of froglock to kill, try the Gaz warriors. I stayed for 2 nights and
came away with a full set of mesh and a few left overs to bank or give away.
Now noted, you cant go alone as the Gaz warriors are from level 18th to 22nd as
I seem to have found.
Just wanting to help my fellow brothers get the armor they need...If you
consider this a spoiler I noted at the top of this page it might be. Ill send
in more info as i can get it. Take care friends and Ill see you on Povar. Im
Jamez Shaolin 24th lvl Monk .
